participant_1.background:
I love to go for long runs in the park, even when the weather is unpredictable.
I take care of my appearance.
As a banker, I start my day by eating a delicious steak breakfast before heading into the office.
i love watching basketball.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.

participant_2.background:
I love my leather clothes because they make me feel confident and powerful.
i believe the rich shouldn t be taxed as much.
I'm proud of my ability to juggle my many roles and responsibilities.
I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.
i have six brothers.

content.text: What's up!
Good! What about you? What do you do for work?
I'm a banker. I start my day with a steak breakfast.
Oh cool. I don't eat meat, but I love leather clothes. They make me feel confident and powerful.
That's interesting. I love running in the park. It's a great way to clear my head.
I used to love to run, but I don't have time anymore. I have six brothers and a fiance, so I'm always busy juggling my many roles and responsibilities.
That's understandable. I'm glad you have a great relationship with your fiance. I'm not close to my family, but I love my music. I play guitar and piano.
That's awesome. I love music too. I listen to it all the time.
Cool. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into hip hop right now.
Nice. I like some hip hop.
Do you have any favorite artists?
I like Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Drake.
Nice. I like Kendrick Lamar too. He's one of the best.
Yeah, he's really talented.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. What about you?
I'm going to a concert with my fiance.
That sounds fun. Who are you going to see?
We're going to see Kendrick Lamar.
Nice! I'm jealous.
You should come with us!
I might. I'll have to check my schedule.
Okay. Let me know.
You got it.
